name: Star Defense
description: it is a very simple tower defense game that challenges you as it go's from round to round gaining difficulty at an exponential rate, in it there are coins with which you buy turrets, the turrets are listed In the top right and there prices are above them, pick on and click where you want it to go, there is also mines and spikes that go only on the track, and make sure you stop them or you will die to the stars.
